PREFIX bo: <http://www.assero.co.uk/BusinessOperational#>
PREFIX isoC: <http://www.assero.co.uk/ISO11179Concepts#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
INSERT DATA 
{ 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> rdf:type bo:TMcReference . 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> isoC:label "label"^^xsd:string . 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> bo:enabled "true"^^xsd:boolean . 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> bo:optional "false"^^xsd:boolean . 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> bo:ordinal "1"^^xsd:positiveInteger . 
<http://www.example.com/path#parent> bo:reference <http://www.assero.co.uk/X/V1#REF> . 
}
